website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice for a novice gamer – quality build at a slightly lower price point.
pros: We were impressed by this PC's performance, especially at the slightly lower price point
It runs Battlefield on the Ultra settings at around 70 FPS (frames per second)
The computer comes with 8GB of RAM, with 4 additional RAM slots, should you feel the need to add more
Set up was quick and simple
Windows was up and running quickly with no issues
cons: The case is quite difficult to get into, making future upgrades more difficult

website_summaries.verdict: A great value for beginning or mid-range gamers as well as business and home users.
pros: Comes with 10 USB ports, which is more than enough for most gamers
Easy to install extra memory, hard drives, and PCI cards
Fan doesn’t get particularly loud, even under load
cons: Installed hard drives are small for the serious gamer

customer_reviews.title: this desktop is by FAR the best priced desktop for what it includes
customer_reviews.text: i dont understand why this desktop has no ratings. this desktop is by FAR the best priced desktop for what it includes. 8th generation i7 with M.2 SSD????? are you kidding me
customer_reviews.author: Taehoon Yi

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Purchased July 20, 2018, returned for repair on September 14, 2018 and currently have no date when it will be repaired and returned. I was hesitant to purchase a Dell in the first place and I'm regretting my decision daily. The repair company has replaced the operating system and is on day 9 of waiting on a new memory board and a new system board. I was told Dell is very slow in sending replacement parts. Incredibly disappointed with this whole process. Lessons learned: 1) Never buy a Dell and; 2) Never buy a computer on Amazon. I will update this review once we receive the system back.
customer_reviews.author: TenSocMom

customer_reviews.title: Good Computer - Laughable Warranty
customer_reviews.text: The computer itself is good but there was something wrong with the RAM slots that caused any RAM of any description (whether of the same manufacturer, timing or not) to not be recognised. I diagnosed this as a problem with the motherboard but had to threaten to take DELL to the attorney general's and/or have my lawyer deal with them before they finally agreed to examine the machine under warranty. And only THEN after I made those threats publicly on twitter. Great machine. But if you want good service, it's possible some other company may be easier for you to deal with - in my experience, Dell were not at all helpful.
customer_reviews.author: David Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: One of the memories is already full! We don’t even use it that much. Overpriced for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trust
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted to build his own gaming PC. That made me nervous. I prefer to have a warranty from a dependable company. He's had this computer over a month now. So far it has performed exceptionally. No problems at all. I don't think he even uses his Xbox at all anymore... Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Baur

customer_reviews.title: Good value PC
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value PC. I wouldn't really recommend this for a strong gaming system because it doesn't have enough GPU ram. It has a strong CPU though and I will be replacing the graphics card shortly and adding ram to bring it up to gaming level. I am disappointed that the day after I bought it Amazon sent me an email saying I could buy the upgraded version with double the ram and twice the hard drive size for the same $$$. Why didn't I get THAT recommendation first?
customer_reviews.author: Gary S. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far this computer works great. I'm mainly using it for WoW at the moment. Runs the game at ultra settings with no issues. Will report back in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Not what was shown
customer_reviews.text: It fired up fine, quick setup, but when I went inside to see what I was going to need to put another drive in it, it turned out *not* to be what was in the description. Even worse, when I went to Dell and put in the computer's number to check it out, the motherboard in the computer wasn't what was stated on the Dell site that it should be. I couldn't put more drives in. There was no M.2 connector on the motherboard. Different video card. All wrong. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Merriam

customer_reviews.title: New Dell 5680 desktop PC
customer_reviews.text: Very nice PC, boots fast, Graphics are nice. Did not boot on arrival! Gave me a code, five beeps, which related to battery on motherboard. Went out and got new battery and she booted right up. One thing I'm finding on the Intel models is upgrading the DDR memory there doesn't seem to be as many options as the AMD models(5675). Or at least they can't confirm they work with the 5680 models. Overall still a great PC!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Gefken

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, Bright LED, Good Specs
customer_reviews.text: Got this PC for the specs: 6 core i5, SSD, decent graphics card at a reasonable price. It is noisy (fan and clicking) and the bright blue light makes it not so good as home theater/gaming PC. I may end up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not enough room
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this to play online games, mostly fortnite. I was disappointed when it couldn’t fit apex as well, this was after I deleted everything including Microsoft. However, it’s very quiet and my cat likes to sit on it while I game.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good
customer_reviews.text: It's reasonably fast. No reliability issues. Upgrading hardware is simple. One M.2 slot for SATA SSD (not PCIe). Description leads you to believe it might accept two. The rear fan is obnoxiously loud. I replaced it with Noctua NF-A9 5V 92mm Fan.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Boot time is beautifully fast, download speed and multitasking is smooth as ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a Dell XPS 15 9550 (laptop), and this is a clear upgrade. Boot time is beautifully fast, download speed and multitasking is smooth as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Turn this product on Christmas day and it stayed on for about 3 seconds and then shut off. notified Amazon and they said they had to wait for the product to get back to them for they could refund me my money which could take up to 10 days. they said they have to do this because they were only a fulfillment center. maybe a company like Amazon should partner with people whose product they back, and refund me the money so I can buy another computer.
customer_reviews.author: daniel sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Dollar
customer_reviews.text: Works great, first desktop I've purchased so I'm happy with it. Also, all you really need to buy is maybe some more memory and ram to have a beast of a computer. Overall though, for its price you really can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Magana

customer_reviews.title: Loose screw and unconnected component
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, I heard something rattling around inside. When I unscrewed and opened it up, there was a random loose screw. Also the wireless card (?) was not inserted and I had to figure out where it goes and place it myself. Other than that, I haven't noticed any problems with the computer. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Micky

customer_reviews.title: Run
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Returned once, now the replacement unit breaks 8 months later.
customer_reviews.author: Michael New

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My son saved up and bout this and he absolutely love it. It runs fortnite all epic settings at 100 FPS, Terra Tech max setting perfectly and CSGO max setting very high FPS. It runs very quietly and I would recommend for anybody trying to get a gaming pc that is not to overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: John Michael Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gaming desktop!
customer_reviews.text: runs any game i've tried. business, gaming, whatever, this Dell is an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: RyanG

customer_reviews.title: Better off buying direct from Dell
customer_reviews.text: In the photos is shows an extra video card with more output ports but my did not cone with that.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Missing activation
customer_reviews.text: Happy with computer, except the operating system that came preloaded on it tells me it needs to be activated. Will not activate. This does not prevent me from using it, but is annoying to see the message on the desktop constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: Good baseline chassis for a gaming rig
customer_reviews.text: For the money I am very happy with it. I put another 8GB stick of RAM to add to the 8GB that it came with, but I bought this play VR and it works well. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan R

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: NO SIGNAL: The system consistently loses it's connection to the Nvidia graphics card. When you re-start the PC it says to "PLEASE POWER DOWN AND CONNECT THE PCIe CABLE(s) FOR ALL GRAPHICS CARDS". It simply doesn't reconnect anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Nice value for money
customer_reviews.text: Som saved his money for first gaming PC. He loves it says its so smooth. Needed to purchase an extra HDMI cable for second monitor as it doesn’t take the vgmi cables. He loves the way it looks and runs and is very quiet. Easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Gem

customer_reviews.title: Decent specs but horrible tech support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for gaming purposes, but each time I tried running a game it crashes tried the Dell tech support hoping they could fix the problem, but no help they couldn't find the solution to the problem I spent 5 days with them and nothing horrible experience. I hope u guys don't have the same experience as I did. Sorry for any mistakes in my review.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: better than the one with GTX 1060
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Very good upgrade from my previous garbage laptop. Reason for it being better is it's dedicated vram.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Failed audio renderer
customer_reviews.text: I have used this computer for a week now, and am getting messages that the audio rendering has failed.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son, and he hasn't had any complaints. It was easy to set up, packaged well, and works as advertised. We've been very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Happy Gamer
customer_reviews.text: I play a lot of MMOs (WoW, SWTOR, GW2). I have been very pleased. Great graphics and speed. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindle

customer_reviews.title: So Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Its beautiful! I'm so pleased ! Dell team your awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good Gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: Great starting PC for gaming. Able to run games very well on High settings. Just take advantage in the 1tb hard drive before the ssd is full.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: This is my first gaming PC and Im happy with my purchase. I can run most games on medium or high.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and the warranty to get
customer_reviews.text: Getting a new one once my warranty expires “if” it’s gets messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Rojaz

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, runs great, excellent set up at a great price. Great value. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adam L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellently priced gaming pc that can run newer games very well.
customer_reviews.author: JPark

customer_reviews.title: Your getting what you payed for and more
customer_reviews.text: It’s great and can handle pretty much everything . No upgrades needed. If your looking for led then the blue lighting is good but if you are looking for rainbow led then you can look for something else but it does not affect the performance. This is all around one of the best Budget pc’s.
customer_reviews.author: Bxmama
